title: 1128 40 "The Nightmare Strikes - Godhead of Science & Defense, St. Saturn"Transliteration: "Akumu Shūrai - Kagaku Bōei Bushin Satān-sei" (Japanese:悪夢襲来 科学防衛武神サターン聖) Nozomu Shishido Shinzō Fujita Shin Kashiwaguma May 4, 2025(2025-05-04) 3.2%[43]
transformers_text:
1128 40 "The Nightmare Strikes - Godhead of Science & Defense, St. Saturn"Transliteration: "Akumu Shūrai - Kagaku Bōei Bushin Satān-sei" (Japanese:悪夢襲来 科学防衛武神サターン聖) Nozomu Shishido Shinzō Fujita Shin Kashiwaguma May 4, 2025(2025-05-04) 3.2%[43]

The Pacifistas attack the Marines as Dr. Vegapunk's group moves toward the Fabiriophase. Sanji finds Bonney, who's under assault by Vice Admiral Pomsky. Bonney uses herNDEtechnique to knock out the Marines but is cornered by Vice Admiral Bluegrass. Sanji rescues Bonney, and they return to the Vegatank-08. Meanwhile, Luffy’s battle with Kizaru intensifies. St. Saturn arrives on Egghead, halting the Pacifistas and warning the Marines. He transforms into a demonic spider hybrid and kills a Marine who looks at him. As Sanji’s group tries to retreat, Kizaru destroys their escape route, causing them to fall. Luffy hits Kizaru with aGum-Gum Star Gunbefore returning to normal due to Fifth Gear's exhaustion. The Vegatank-08 crashes, but the crew survives. Saturn confronts Vegapunk, and Bonney, overcome with rage and grief, stabs Saturn.
